detail_desc: Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a herringbone weave made from a linen blend with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and top and reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Warm-lined hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded top edge. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted soles. Height of soles 2 cm.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wide ties at the neck. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Checked shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned, crinkled jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a shimmering skirt in layers of tulle to create volume. Lined skirt.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Lined hood, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets, diagonal, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Gloves in a fine-knit wool blend with a Thinsulate™ lining.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué on the front.
Large scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish. Fringe trims along the short sides.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip on the inside and adjustable straps with metal buckles. Fabric linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heels 3.5 cm.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.

Calf-length dress in a cotton crêpe weave with a square neckline and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and around the hems, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Shorts in patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Top in soft terry with a print motif on the front and buttons at the back. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist with wide elastication, a fake fly and pockets in the side seams with metal details.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey with an open chest pocket.
Running gloves with uppers in windproof, functional fabric and ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a press-stud placket and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight-cut hems.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-knit details, a racer back and elasticated hem. Light support. Seamless.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a rib-knit turtle neck, long raglan sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x16x24 cm.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Running trousers in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Concealed, mesh-lined side pockets, a zip at the hems, and reflective details. Regular fit.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and pockets in the side seams.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in a fine knit with a double layer at the top and long sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a low-cut back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.

Calf-length off-the-shoulder dress in cotton poplin with a gentle V-neck front and back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide wrapover flounce at the top with elastication at the shoulders. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, a gathered seam at the bottom and flared skirt. Lined.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder dress in soft viscose jersey with elastication and a second layer of fabric at the top with short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the at the waist and a long slit at the hem.
Dress with a cotton jersey top and skirt in woven fabric. Flutter sleeves, an open chest pocket and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Unlined.
Imitation leather biker jacket with a diagonal zip, collar, shoulder tabs with decorative press-studs, zipped front pockets and a yoke at the back. Lined.
Slightly shorter-style jumper knitted in a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Knee-length skirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side and a seam with a wide, gathered flounce at the hem.
Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with a quilted shaft that has a zip on the inside. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Jacket in fine-knit slub cotton with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders, side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined hood and raglan sleeves in woven fabric. Zip down the front, side pockets and reflective details. Unlined.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a small embroidery detail on the front and an opening with ties at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Straw hat with a fabric band. Lined. Width of brim 2.5 cm.
Short, V-neck dress in an airy viscose and linen weave with gathered shoulder seams, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short butterfly sleeves. Lined bodice.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined top section.

Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Low-cut back with a concealed zip, a seam at the waist and an airy skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a round neckline, a small opening and button at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves with flounces.

Gently fitted, knee-length dress in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length, double-breasted trenchcoat in a stretch weave with a wide collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Shoulder tabs with a button, a detachable belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a small opening at the front with support panels and narrow satin ribbon ties. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide, elasticated lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long dress in patterned chiffon crêpe with smocking at the shoulders, cuffs and waist. V-neck with ties at the top, long puff sleeves and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front with a chin guard, a fake flap pocket on the tummy, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail, an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide elastic panel at the hem. Extra firm support.

Chimi x H&M. A pair of retro-inspired shorts that are perfect for both trips to the beach and rooftop parties in town. Made from woven fabric with a slight sheen, the shorts finish just above the knee and have covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and short slits in the sides. Available in two summery pastel shades.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Knee-length skirt in embroidered jersey with a concealed zip at the back.
Shorts in velour with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a decorative bow at the front, zip at the back and front pockets. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Wide-fitting top with short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
